abstract: Alibaba offered on Tuesday to buy the remaining shares of Alibaba.com for 13.50 Hong Kong dollars a share, roughly the same price at which the unit went public in 2007.
snippet: Alibaba offered on Tuesday to buy the remaining shares of Alibaba.com for 13.50 Hong Kong dollars a share, roughly the same price at which the unit went public in 2007.
lead_paragraph: Alibaba.com, the only publicly traded subsidiary of the Internet giant Alibaba Group, may soon be private.

headline.main: Alibaba Offers to Take Subsidiary Private
